engalanthaya, pinlanthaya, chekoslowakiyawa ha amerikawen pamini nagara sa nirmana ha salasum shilpi wisheshagnyayan samanga sahaya salasum shilpiyaku lesa dikman wasara dekak sewaya kala.nawasiya haththa hathe sidu wu deshapalana peraliyath samangama merata sanwardhana wyapruthi rasak kriyawata nanwimata pathwu rajaya katayuthu kala.ee anuwa ethera welendasal kihipayakin parlimenthuwa ha rajaye godanangilla athulu parani godanagili kihipayakin yuktha wu kolambaa kotuwa aashritha pradeshayath, thadasanna pradeshayath sanwardhanaya kirima mulika kotagath wyapruthiya pradhana thanak gaththa.

owun thawamath sitinne deshapalana rakawarana laba ganimata balagena,” yi hitapu eksath janapada oththu sewaka snodan twitar paniwidayakin pawasa thibe.amerika eksath janapadaye jathika aarakshaka anshaya thama rate purawasiyange saha lokaya pura aandu wala oththu balana hati lokayata helikirima nisa dadayamata lakwi palagiya snodan 2013 juni 10 da sita juni 23 dakwa aagiya athak prasiddhiyata pathwi thibune natha.handalsblat gaweshaka warthakara anshaye pradhani sunka ayiwarsan nithignya tibo saha supun samaga | seya: jen rasalajith, wanesa supun saha nadikajarmaniye sita palakerena handalsblat wyaparika prakashanaya dan helidaraw kota athi paridi ee samaye edward snodan honkon hi sangawa thaba gena aththe shri lankika ajith, pilipina jathika wanesa saha shri lankika supun, nadika yuwalayi.owunta snodan bharadi aththe owunge deshapalana rakawarana laba dima wenuwen madihath wana manawa himikam nithignya robat tibo wisini.deshapalana rakawal patha pamina sitina dahas sankhyatha janakayakage niwahan mada pihiti kuda gewal snodange honkon rakshasthanaya bawata pathwiya.“ee tharam prasiddha kenek honkon wala wadathma paribhawayata path janathawa athara indiwi kiya kawuruth hithanne na” yi robat tibo nashanal post puwathpathata pawasa thibuni.ajith, wanesa, nadika saha supun dana sitiye ohu ‘prasiddha’ ayaku bawath ‘aarakshawa’ soyana bawath pamani.thaman rakawal di aththe katadayi owun danagena aththe pasuda puwathpathwala mul pituwala ohuge dawantha chayarupayak pala kara thibenu dakimen anathuruwayi.sathi dekak honkon hi sangawi siti edward snodan ethanin pala giye thawakalika deshapalana rakawarana labadun rusiyawatayi.edward snodan saha robart tibo moskawhidi | seya: enwayi jenifardolar koti pahakohuge jiwithaya rakadun deshapalana anathayange thathwaya thawath naraka athata hari thibu bawa pasugiya juli masaye honkon bala giya handalsblat puwathpatha wartha kara thibuni.pilipinayen pamini wanesata siya diyani kiyanage pasal poth ragena dimata mudal natha.

prajathanthrawadaya, wisiwani siyawase uthuru tharuwa wima apeksha kalenam, ada eya yalisithabalima, prathinirmanaya, saha aragalaya awashya kereyi.” “janathawa binda damima” yanuwen nam kota athi ehi purwikawehi aya mese kiyayi: shithala yuddhaya awasanayedi prajathanthrawadaya goliya washayen wijayagrahanaya kota athayi prakasha kerethma nawa aakaraye aandukaranamaya tharkanayak yuro-athlanthika lokaye mudaharemin thibuni.
